name: Life of a Capitalist
detailed_description:
Life of a Capitalist is a highly addictive economy simulation game with interesting features. Time to create your own journey in the economy!

Investments
Newspaper Delivery to Real Estate Investments… You have to choose the right option for you to invest.

Equipment
Gain new items and unique bonuses with your progress.

Reports
See economical reports of your investments and decide wisely for next steps.

Staffs
Hire staffs and manage job applications that fits to your needs.

Rich List
Win the game with being the #1 in the rich list of the world.
